title: AI-Powered Health Assistant
description: An intelligent virtual health assistant that provides personalized health advice and monitors patient vitals in real-time.

title: Smart Home Automation System
description: A comprehensive smart home system that allows users to control lighting, security, and appliances remotely using a mobile app.

title: Blockchain for Secure Voting
description: A secure voting system utilizing blockchain technology to ensure transparency and integrity in the electoral process.

title: Augmented Reality Shopping Experience
description: An augmented reality application that allows users to try on clothes and accessories virtually before purchasing.

title: Renewable Energy Management System
description: A system to monitor and optimize the use of renewable energy sources in urban environments, promoting sustainability.
